website_summaries.verdict: With long-reach extendable attachments and a microfiber cleaning tool, this model is a great option for cleaning furniture and drapes.
pros: The extension wand included in this model makes cleaning hard to reach crevices and high up areas, like ceiling fans, a snap
The microfiber cleaning attachment is perfect for removing pet hair from upholstery
It is as lightweight and powerful as comparable Dirt Devil stick vacuums
cons: The motor tends to run hot with prolonged usage

customer_reviews.title: I really feel cheated!
customer_reviews.text: It does a terrible job cleaning the floor, just pushes the dirt around. All the interchangeable parts stick and are difficult to switch out. Worst of all, the unit heats up dangerously hot and you cant hold it without practically burning your hand. Because I didn't use it right away after buying it (30 days is all you have to do a return, I complained 5 days past the deadline) I couldn't return it and I'm out the money. I bought the extra mop heads too. I'm so angry. Big rip off!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ldavis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Machine plus Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item for almost a year. I liked everything else about the many attachments but the carpet brush was not very cooperative with me. One day the brush broke. I remembered I had a warranty and decided to call in and request for a replacement brush. Excellent customer service! The rep walked me through the process and told me to expect a replacement within 5 weeks. I got a whole upgraded vacuum cleaner 360 Reach Pro Corded Bagless Stick with attachments in a matter of days! The brush is bigger and it works even better on hardwood and carpet floors. Great value for money. Great customer service from manufacturer in case of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: achimboza

customer_reviews.title: This was such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: This was such a disappointment. All the adverts lead you to believe the beater brush attachment works on the extension arm so you can reach the floor. This is NOT so. The only way the beater brush attachment works is when it is directly attached to the main piece of the vacuum. This means if you want to use the beater brush you need be vacuuming stairs, furniture or on your knees on the floor. If I could return this item I would. It was a rather expensive lesson.
customer_reviews.author: K.Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Good for special jobs, I'm just not sold on cleaning hard floors with this
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty well for dusting hard floors, but doesn't pick up little objects as well as I'd hoped (not a great deal of suction. Now, for specialized dusting and vacuuming (like cars, blinds, overhead fans, etc., I think it will work fine because there are a lot of different attachments you can use, but, on floors, I can't say that it outperforms a dust mop by much.
customer_reviews.author: A. Matheny

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to clean all my ceiling fans. It quit while vacuuming edges of carpet. Dead. Used fancy brush to clean my fan blades, but no power.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 1/2 months!
customer_reviews.text: We bought it at the end of July for our motorhome. Maybe vacuum the wood floors and fans 2 x a month. Just regular daily dirt. It's been a challenge to use this vacuum! Today it just stopped working. Very disappointed and unhappy with this Dirt Devil. I have another Dirt Devil Vacuum cleaner in the house and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: Microfiber cloth instead of a beater brush
customer_reviews.text: I loved the microfiber cloth for my new wood floors. Nice attachments and bag. The only thing I don’t like is when I wrap the cord to put it away there is barely enough room fro the whole cord to wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine since 2016 and I love it! Only, I left the foam filter lying on the counter after cleaning and my cat ate it. I can’t find replacement.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lively

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum, works well. However the exhaust air which is warm, exitis from the top below the handle. You arm and hand will feel it. Not a good designed. After an extended period of use, I believe it might get too warm. Only used once. I do not recommend, purchasing this vacuum unless the design is changed. See photos below, this shows location of exhaust air and the close proximity to your hand and arm
customer_reviews.author: AnnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Weakest vacuum suction & tips move constantly. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: very low suction, the main roller tip that rotates both directions on carpet moves left and right even when you trying to vacuum straight back and forth. the connections are a helpful feature until you have to go over it with a swiffer to actually pickup the dirt. so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bessy A. Lesz

customer_reviews.title: Handy Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning the ceiling fan blades in our home (8 ceiling fans) has never been a favorite project of mine. With the 360 I no longer have to haul out a step ladder, buckets of water, etc. All I need now is the 360 and a step stool. It is also a favorite of my wife's for cleaning the tile floors. It is a nice addition to our regular vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Father Eldon W. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Burned By The (dirt) Devil or Just A Totally Disappointing Product
customer_reviews.text: While I thought this was just what I needed for all my cleaning chores, I was wrong. I could have put up with less than good suction, the motor quit running within three, count them, 3 months! And naturally I missed the "return by" date. No faulting Amazon for policy, but boo hiss to Dirt Devil's poor product.
customer_reviews.author: LadyArcher

customer_reviews.title: Listing is incorrect. Maybe wrong part #?
customer_reviews.text: This item is listed as Part # SD 12515B, which according to Dirt Devil's website is supposed to come with the Ceiling Fan Tool. However, the item which shipped did not come with the tool. I think this listing is incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: ShrubZero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It does everything they say it does.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Houston

customer_reviews.title: Over-heats easily
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is very handy for cleaning the stairs and the ceiling fans, however, after about 10-15 minutes of use it overheated and turned off and wouldn't turn back on for at least 30 minutes. It makes the stair cleaning a lot easier because it's a lot more mobile than my large, upright Dyson and it weighs less. I'm hoping to use it in my car this week and see how it does there. I hope it can make it through the car without over-heating.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jenkinson

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This product will not work with low or shag throw down rugs. Mostly effective on hard floors and loose dust up high.
customer_reviews.author: Rob A.

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I like it better than I thought! It's compact, reliable, coverts nicely, great accessory bag, powerful...well worth the $$. I have always liked my Dirt Devil products, this does not disappoint! The ONLY con is that the smaller head for larger object cleanup does not swivel perfectly, but suctions good.
customer_reviews.author: JKMudGirl

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum worked for 7 mins at the most. Attempted a 2nd try a few days after the first and stopped again at 7 mins. Was already assembled when I received it so I was already wondering if it had been purchased and returned. Also missing an accessory for cleaning stairs. Unfortunately, an exchange wasn't an option so don't know if it truly works to clean steps.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Did not Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Dirt Devil for use in our motorhome. Believed that the break down design would make it easy to store. Upon receiving the Dirt Devil we tried it on a smooth wood floor with the vacuum dust tool. The vacuum would only dust and pushed a small paperclip across the floor. None of the dirt was pulled into the vacuum. Item returned to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum easy use.
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for laminate or tile floors nice long cord ease to empty dirt cup.extension pole very easy to operate.love this model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what i expected. has very little suction just moves around dust and doesnt pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Get it. If you have all hardwood floors. Great product
customer_reviews.author: JMW

customer_reviews.title: Overall it is a great vaccum. My only problem/concern is how hot the ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a great vaccum. My only problem/concern is how hot the motor gets when its in use. I can use it for something as simple as vaccuming off my couch and the motor gets hot. :( I love how long the cord is. I can do my entire staircase without having to unplug it and plug it is elsewhere. It is pretty lightweight. My 10 and 8 year olds can use it with zero problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian A Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I use this for cleaning up after projects, it has great suction. I love the little crevice attachment for tight areas.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome. Does everything I thought it would do
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. Does everything I thought it would do. I do have two small rugs in my home and have to get down on my knees to use the roller attachment to "vacuum" those, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L. DiFulco

customer_reviews.title: While the unit has good suction power
customer_reviews.text: While the unit has good suction power, the tools that comes with it are cumbersome, i cant get an efficient way to clean the wood floor, and it is very difficult to clean the small rugs, returned!
customer_reviews.author: hao nguyen

customer_reviews.title: All in One Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does an excellent job of cleaning bare floors. The dusting pad cleans the edges of the room while the vacuum sucks in the crumbs, etc.I have a problem with the weight of the power handle but I have arthritis in my hands. The Dirt Devil comes with many attachments.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: An advanced swifter sweeper
customer_reviews.text: This is good for floor use However the attachments are worthless
customer_reviews.author: charlotte neff

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Have only had the vacuum a few days & just cleaned the basement carpeted stairs but it did a super job & pulled up a lot of dir easily.
customer_reviews.author: luvretmt

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much, i have all hard floors and this is perfect. Even with 2 cats this vacuum is all i need.
customer_reviews.author: charles hahn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Needs empties frequently, but is GREAT for hard wood/laminent/tile flooring. Gets dust and dust bunnies too. I bought an extra pad for it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: It’s good, but has no power at all.. it would be easier for you to use a broom than this. Wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto A

customer_reviews.title: Good daily cleaning, not a deep clean
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and light. I like the attachments. It’s a good daily clean but not a deep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Gloor

customer_reviews.title: It's light weight and easy for me to use on the stairs
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner system has been a lifesaver. It now takes me maybe 30min to clean my wood floors and stairs rather then an hour +. It's light weight and easy for me to use on the stairs. Only thing is it does seem to get very hot in the rear.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Good power
customer_reviews.text: Power is good and like the compatibility in the carry/storage bag. A flexible hose, wider brush roller, & simple upholstery brush attachment would be an improvement. The suction on dusting attachments doesn't appear to be positioned for any real functionality.
customer_reviews.author: BuckIt

customer_reviews.title: Great for stairs.
customer_reviews.text: The dirt catcher is really small and fills up quickly. However that is just motivation to vacuum more often so not necessarily a bad thing. Pieces go together smoothly. I love it for my stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a pain to use if you are looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a pain to use if you are looking for something small this is not it. It is not really easier than a normal vac.
customer_reviews.author: Shiftster

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Although it comes with a carpet attachment, there is no power rod that will allow you to use it as a floor vacuum. The package also came opened and retaped. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Wolfa

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have enough suction. If it did it would be ideal. Now it is more of a dust mop.
customer_reviews.author: tessa

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you have pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: If you have pets this vacuum is not for you. The motor intake clogs with hair and it gets very hot. The hair does not dump out of the cup, you have to pull it out multiple times. I cleaned two rooms and it quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Pet lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! I bought it to replace my swiffer- and it is so much better! Not only do you not lose power because of it being plugged in, but it has so many accessories you can do so much with it!
customer_reviews.author: Azreal Kazmierczak

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We have hard wood floors so it's so much easier than always sweeping and not as tough as a regular vacuum. We also have a long haired cat so having the Micro fiber cloth on it makes it so much easier to get all the cat hair. I haven't really used the other tools with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: sarahnoel

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: insufficient suction. would never recommend purchasing this item. the attachment for stairs is poorly designed as well.
customer_reviews.author: mreiff

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it but there's these weird plastic parts that stick ...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like it but there's these weird plastic parts that stick out of the vacuum that always bumps into my right leg when I'm using it (I'm right handed)- see photo- it left many bruises..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love All The attachments
customer_reviews.text: This Sucker Works Amazinglingly !!!! Love All The attachments ... I have Fibromyalgia & Anyone else that has it knows what A pain it is to clean Your Celing Fan Blades , Furniture & Our Biggest Rival Stairs !!!! AMEN To this 360
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: not very good on carpet
customer_reviews.text: heavy, a lot of pieces, not very good on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suction is not strong. It is heavy to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Suction is not strong. It is heavy to hold for a long time. Does not work well at all.
customer_reviews.author: P. Shuler

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility. Poor construction. Dust cup has broken twice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: IT IS TOO HEAVY, NEED TO MAKE IT LIGHTER FOR US SENIORS
customer_reviews.author: nguiher

customer_reviews.title: but I have to constantly pull the hair off the pad or it just pushes the dog fun around the house
customer_reviews.text: I have all hardwood floors, It works ok, but I have to constantly pull the hair off the pad or it just pushes the dog fun around the house. It needs a better vacuum function. Also I have run the pad through the washer several times and it does not come out clean (fur free).
customer_reviews.author: beth peck

customer_reviews.title: I like the extra attachement for clean ceilling Fan blades
customer_reviews.text: This is the right one for Me (for wood or laminate floor) .I like the extra attachement for clean ceilling Fan blades .
customer_reviews.author: Truong Vo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much better for hardwood floors that my my Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: so good product, not very
customer_reviews.text: After 5 uses it failed. looks like junk to me
customer_reviews.author: Donald Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for the time it worked though
customer_reviews.text: It died after 3 1/2 months. Loved it for the time it worked though!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie S

customer_reviews.title: The item arrived on time and was in excellent condition. The only complaint I have about the ...
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and was in excellent condition. The only complaint I have about the product itself is that it does not have a retractable cord, which would be very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Deb River

customer_reviews.title: dust pad and power brush work really good. To use the other attachment for ceiling fan ...
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum, dust pad and power brush work really good. To use the other attachment for ceiling fan was awkward and lifting the vacuum over head was heavy. The other duster attachment was hard to use, the elbow was really stiff at first and then didn't hold it's position.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. Good power. Easy to use. Plenty of attachments for all situations. Storage bag was unexpected plus.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Ausman

customer_reviews.title: Dirty devil
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to lickk it to keep it from swiveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a disappointment. It works ok on the floor the crevice ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a disappointment. It works ok on the floor the crevice tool is notched so it does not work!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Every home needs one!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect item for our house. Very easy to use and move around. Not heavy at all. It keeps the hardwood floors free of the darn dog hair and can be used with other utensils for cleaning wood blinds and ceiling fans. Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is excellent for carpeted stairs. It also is very good on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware.  This vacuum sucks
customer_reviews.text: The engine burned out after only 2 months. I only used it a handful of times. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Bonderud

customer_reviews.title: I bought this specifically because my house was a dusty ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because my house was a dusty mess. It really knocked out everything from my walls, door frames, windows, floors and fans using all the various attachments. The only downfall is that it can get really heavy to carry around if you're doing a whole house all at once.
customer_reviews.author: The A's

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice just what I needed.priced less than the none pro model at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase decision
customer_reviews.text: terrible, I was expecting it operate on New Zealand power cycle as it was able to be shipped to Auckland. I purchased a plug converter so we could plug into our power and it started up then just stopped. I have not been able to get the unit to operate since. Complete waste of money if you live in New Zealand don't buy this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but didn't even last a year. The hose connection to the base broke 4 months in. Tried contacting dirt devil but no response. Very dissatisfied and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Assembled incorrectly
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed that this product doesn't work correctly. I was looking for a small vacuum for my NYC apartment before my move and the stick was assembled backwards :( I realized it after the return window was closed. It would be such an amazing product if it was correct. Just realized
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: TV ad  was impressive, product was not.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the lack of good suction, the ad on TV was impressive the product was not. I would give 5 stars for the ease of returning and how promptly the correct amount was credited to my credit card.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this model
customer_reviews.text: This model has several design defects and I must return it. The vacuum stick is held into the motor by a small flimsy spring lock that popped out the first time I used the vacuum. Besides, the motor in the hand makes the vacuum too heavy to hold, especially if one has arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Onerheats after 15 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 months ago. I've used 4 times and it has overheated each time. Now it won't turn on at all and it's too late to return. Piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH A MOLYNEAUX

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: returned it, as it was for wood floors and I have wall to wall carpet
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Woolley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: IT IS NOT FOR MY AGE.I AM TO OLD AND IS TO HEAVY FOR ME. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would like it a lot more if it had a power ...
customer_reviews.text: I would like it a lot more if it had a power head for rugs and carpet. Works good on my hard wood floors. I could give it five stars if that was added to the 360.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: First day it doesn't work. Is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Clemente

customer_reviews.title: It is not good. I return the goods
customer_reviews.text: It is not good. I return the goods. It heat up very fast,started for one minute it will stop because it is too hot. Off it for about 15-20 minutes it will work again for one minute.
customer_reviews.author: Minty

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I hate it! Hate it! Hate it! I am sending it back dirt and all!
customer_reviews.author: Rita M Love

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is awful
customer_reviews.text: It's a turd. Don't buy. And DD customer support is really unhelpful.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil vacuum cleaner 360.  Too heavy for an elderly lady to use.
customer_reviews.text: Dirt Devil vacuum cleaner 360. Great product but was too heavy for me to use. I am an elderly lady and was unable to manage the weight of the motor at the top. While it really worked well I passed on to a local thrift store who helps homeless people through donations given to their “re-sale store”.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R. Gillion

customer_reviews.title: It is not a bad vacuum, but it is not as handy as ...
customer_reviews.text: I had higher hopes for this little vacuum than it delivered. It is not a bad vacuum, but it is not as handy as I had hoped. This version comes with a small beater bar attachment for stairs and small places to use as a handheld, but not one for carpet or rugs. It is not clear in the description that it is that way. The dust bowl with no bag is convenient and it sucks dirt OK.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for folks with hairy dogs!
customer_reviews.text: It's very difficult to clean a house with two golden retrievers and hardwood floors! This vacuum was the answer to my prayers! :-) Works as described and is very easy to use all of the attachments. My favorite tool is the floor wand, as it flexes to get the baseboards and can reach under furniture, where a regular vacuum can't. And the ceiling fans and picture frame tops are a breeze with the flexible wand attachment. Makes it fun to clean when you have the right tools at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi in Jax

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum picks up real good, powerful, storage bag is nice touch and came with good accessories. Only drawback for me is the cord storage could be better as my fingers are paralyzed, I can make do. It is a great buy though.
customer_reviews.author: harryR

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: low power poor suction. I should have returned this one.
customer_reviews.author: james d. kietzer

customer_reviews.title: my teenager loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, excellent reach, completely cleanable! It's so easy, even my teenager will gladly use it for cleanup :) I LOVE that almost every single piece is washable, cos there's no other way to really get the dust and dirt out of the machine... It lives up to its promise. I use it on the couch, the floor, corners, creases, ceilings, car... you get the idea. Haven't found a down side to it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mel A

customer_reviews.title: Works great on our hardwood floors between major cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our hardwood floors between major cleaning. Bought this to replace the cordless model which was way underpowered and battery never lasted long enough. This is worth dealing with he cord, unless you have a small area and don’t have a pet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mariot

customer_reviews.title: it is not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought it six months ago. I use it on hard floor and carpet. Vacuum's overall design is not ergonomic enough, it is not easy to use, and my arms feel very tired after cleaning. Dirt gets stuck all the time... After six months of use the vacuum stops working after ten to twenty minutes of being on.
customer_reviews.author: natalia

customer_reviews.title: I DO wish I could give this unit a better rating but I must be honest
customer_reviews.text: I DO wish I could give this unit a better rating but I must be honest. Love the DD products but this unit is only good for dusting and the suction is not strong enough to work through those well made dusting pads.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S.

customer_reviews.title: Might be better off with a broom.
customer_reviews.text: Works reasonably well. Seems to push the dirt around vs sucking it up, but it does get most of it with a little patience. A good broom and dust pan wight work almost as well.
customer_reviews.author: D J L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum with all the components you will need for ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vacuum with all the components you will need for cleaning all around the house. The fabric competes are easy to clean with plain water, I didn't need anything else to clean mine.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Beggs

customer_reviews.title: But most of the attachments aren't helpful or don't work easily, especially the stair one
customer_reviews.text: I'm not as impressed as I thought I would be with it. I got it since we have 0 carpet in our home. But most of the attachments aren't helpful or don't work easily, especially the stair one. I do like the ceiling fan cleaner. There is nothing that is really helpful for rugs. And if you have animals with LONG HAIR - it will clog... a lot. I like it but it does cause me some frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Condron

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice only
customer_reviews.text: total disappointment. especially the carpet head which cannot be pushed forward across carpeting...only dragged backwards. Swivel head would be great to go under furniture but skips over the carpet and doesn't grasp dirt and lint. Now to figure out how to return it???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suction. The product is a little heavier than I would like. The neck pivots in two points and those joints often buckle on their own when pushing around the vacuum. Dirt Devil should redesign those joints to hold up on their own unless the buttons to adjust the angle is engaged. Would not buy again nor recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EddieSayRelax

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum head is probably about 6 inches wide. We have all hardwood floors and tile and we still didn't like it. It's basically for curtains or dry mop. We thought it was great when we ordered it, omg 4 in one! But it's basically an accessory. You would still need a mop and vacuum. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job cleaning corners and under the edges of cabinets.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do a good job and is easy for the kids to use. I wish it had some sort of hanger for the closet so I didn't have to take it apart to put it in the bag. Since I tend to use it with the extension attachment and dusting pad.
customer_reviews.author: AngB

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to empty
customer_reviews.text: Many attachment do not clean well: ceiling fan and roller brush leave a lot of dirt/dust/hair behind. Adequate suction but impossible to empty dirt cup. Dirt and hair get stuck in cyclonic chamber and you have to dig it out with your fingers ( have tried many tools but nothing gets in there). I would not buy again, nor recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: ... bissel (which I bought from a thrift store) suctions better and can be used in carpets
customer_reviews.text: My second hand bissel (which I bought from a thrift store) suctions better and can be used in carpets. This product is only good for hard floors. suction is poor and item is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: The Fudge

customer_reviews.title: this one is a K.I.S.S. machine
customer_reviews.text: A VACUUM CLEANER IS MY MORTAL ENEMY BUT this one is a K.I.S.S. machine that is easy to get, use, and put away
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: We love our vacuum we use to have a cordless one and this was a better option. Plenty of attachments, easy to use, and figure out. We clean it after every few uses and it even is easy enough for my husband to use.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Hanneken

customer_reviews.title: Only need to clean filter after it dirty to get the suction strong again
customer_reviews.text: Has tons of attachments. Only need to clean filter after it dirty to get the suction strong again.
customer_reviews.author: Tan.gerines

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil 360 Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Good suction. Clear receptacle picks up large dirt pretty well, while the micro fibre pad takes care of the rest. Pad washes well. I feel confident using this on my laminate floors. The attachments are a little awkward, but once you get used to them, they do a good job.
customer_reviews.author: golfer

customer_reviews.title: I got it for mother who kepts a very clean ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it for mother who kepts a very clean house and she is 82 years young. She loves it, no more ladders !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie c taylor jr

product_meta.title: Dirt Devil Vacuum Cleaner 360 Reach Pro Corded Bagless Stick and Handheld Vacuum SD12515B
product_meta.description: Style:Reach ProVac, dust and reach- versatility to clean where your upright vacuum can't. 360 Degree Reach Pro speeds through messes from floor to ceiling with 4 multipurpose tools that easily switch this vacuum from a stick to a handheld and back again. Use the 6" wide powered tool to easily convert the 360 to a hand vacuum. It's powerful brush roll is perfect for stairs and upholstery inside as well as a handy car vacuum. Snap back on the extension wand to convert to a stick vacuum and reach up to 12 feet high and low. Use the crevice tool to tackle the toughest cleaning spots and hard to reach cracks. For ceiling fan blades, use the Vac+Dust Ceiling Fan Tool that comes complete with a Swipes Washable Microfiber Pad. For floorwork, attach the Vac+Dust Hard Floor Tool with Swipes Washable Microfiber Pad. It's the combination of a powerful vacuum and the Swipes Microfiber pad that allows you to pick up the dust and debris rather than just pushing it around on the floor. When done simply flip a switch to empty the dirt cup on the bottom and put everything back in the storage bag. The 360 Degree Reach is everything you need for in between cleaning with your upright vacuum and comes with a 3 year warranty.
feature_bullets: Versatility to clean where your upright vacuum can’t, perfect for daily cleaning of pet hair and other debris
Accessory tools easily switch out to allow you to go from floors to ceilings to couches in seconds
Cyclonic Filtration- cuts through any mess with powerful suction
Lightweight and compact- easy to use, easy to store
Includes Fan Tool, Hard Floor Tool, Above Floor Tool, Extension Wand, Swipes Washable Microfiber Pad and Storage Bag
